subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nik Antropov scored the only goal and Chris Mason stopped 43 shots for his first shutout of the season in the Atlanta Thrashers’ 1-0 win over the host Philadelphia Flyers on Thursday night.
snippet: Nik Antropov scored the only goal and Chris Mason stopped 43 shots for his first shutout of the season in the Atlanta Thrashers’ 1-0 win over the host Philadelphia Flyers on Thursday night.
